content.text: Same here, I'm not really into social media, but I'll make an effort to use it to build my reputation at work.
I don't really care about social media, I prefer to spend my time doing other things.
Yeah, I get that. I'm more concerned with my health and the health of my children.
That's good to hear. I like taking my dog for long walks.
I wish I had a dog, they're so cute.
I love my new sweater, it's so comfy!
I like listening to all genres of music except country music.
Me too! I'm a creative person who uses art to process my emotions.
That's cool. I like to write to process my emotions.
Yeah, it is. I'm glad we're having this conversation.
